pr_title: Allow property value to be updated to null

timeline.message:
Allow property value to be updated to null

With the changes in #1598 the BaseThingHandler could no longer update property values to null.

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

timeline.bodyText: Hm, ... shouldn't the value be annotated by @Nullable then?
timeline.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText: That makes sense and if we keep allowing null values the Map value type in protected void updateProperties(Map<String, String> properties) should also be properly annotated. I don't know how common it is for properties to be nullable. Another way could be to add a removeProperty method so we can rid of keys with null values. But updateProperties would also have to be updated for that and I don't know how breaking all these API changes would be. 😉
replies.author: wborn
